app_detail:
World News Pro ğŸ“° brings you news from the credible unbiased news sources from all around the World.

World News is the best-categorized news aggregator app that provides the news from all around the world in a suitable news category, in short, simple and effective form.

The app also offers the live streaming of the news channels, social features & popular news categories so you can read the news from categories to suit your interests.

World News is the best "paid news app" under the category of News and Magazines in the google play store.

World News is a smart news app that organizes whatâ€™s happening in the world to help you learn more about the stories that matter to you.

It can be nearly impossible to keep up with every story you care about. With your briefing, easily stay in the know about whatâ€™s important and relevant to you. Your briefing updates throughout the day bringing you the top stories you need to know, including local stories, national news, and world content.

Understand the full context of any story with just a tap. World News gives you everything online about a story and organizes it for you.

â¤ News Categories offered by this App:

â€¢ Top news
â€¢ Breaking news(breaking news)
â€¢ Videos and Audios of news
â€¢ Politics
â€¢ US news (United States of America news)
â€¢ UK & Europe news (Europe and United Kingdom news)
â€¢ Asia news
â€¢ Africa news
â€¢ Middle East news
â€¢ Business news
â€¢ Technology and Gaming news
â€¢ Sports news
â€¢ Entertainment news
â€¢ Arts news
â€¢ Lifestyle, Travel and Health news
â€¢ Crypto Currency news

â¤ Features:

â€¢ Ads - Free Pro Version
â€¢ Save you more time
â€¢ Read, Explore, Share & make it favourite â¤
â€¢ Easy to use

â¤ What "World News Pro ğŸ“°" brings to you:

â€¢ Top Stories brings you the latest, breaking news from our trusted global credible unbiased news sources.
â€¢ It is one of the best free news apps from popular news apps for free in google play
â€¢ World News: A global and International News App is the news headlines app that provides news headlines, latest news today, today's news headlines, latest breaking news, national news in english, world breaking news, latest national news in english, breaking news english, today news live, news highlights, latest news update today, today's top news headlines, today's national news in english, world news today, today's fresh news, etc.
â€¢ This App also brings you what's the news today, today news in english, latest news in english, live breaking news, top news stories, today's national news, current news today, breaking news headline, etc.
â€¢ This World News app is one of the popular news aggregator news apps brings you news break, news break local & breaking, news feed eradicator, news live stream, news reader etc.
â€¢ World News : A Global and International News App also provides news streaming live, newsstand, news english etc some powerful features.
â€¢ We can call it as all in one news app, newsbreak app, news papers apps, news updates app, news apps for android free.
â€¢ This News App provides america news today, news uk free, Europe news, asia news, africa news, middle-east news, us news, uk news from popular, credible, unbiased, national and international, multiple news sources.


â¤ Our News Sources:

BBC, CNN, ABC, USA Today, Reuters, New York Times, Fox, U.S., The Guardian, Fortune Business, HRB, Entrepreneur, ESPN Sports, The Verge, Engadget, TechCrunch, Wired, The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Forbes, ESPN, CBS Sports, National Geographic, Travel + Leisure, Lonely Planet, bbc news, Dkoding News,

News & Politics: discover the latest headlines in national and world news, with newspapers & publications like The New York Times, CNN, Politico, Axios

And many, many more...

â—‰ Share News on:
â€¢ facebook, whatsApp, instagram, reddit, hike, e-mail, hotmail, yahoo, gmail, games & other social platforms

If any query contact us: ab.apps.206@gmail.com
